Susannah Marie Olivia Hearn, the daughter of Dr. Jana Srba Hearn and Dr. M. F. Hearn Jr. of Pittsburgh, was married yesterday to Nikolas Peter Kerest, the son of Naomi Waelsch Kerest and Joseph P. Kerest of Block Island in Rhode Island. The Rev. Frederick Lanz, an American Baptist minister, officiated at Sullivan House, a bed-and-breakfast on Block Island.

Mrs. Kerest, 27, graduated from Wesleyan University. Next month she is to begin as a director of fund-raising at the University of Vermont in Burlington. Her father is a professor of the history of architecture and the director of the architectural studies program at the University of Pittsburgh.

Mr. Kerest, also 27, graduated from Williams College. In May, he received a law degree magna cum laude from Cornell University. Next month he is to begin as a law clerk, in Burlington, to Judge Fred I. Parker of the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit. His mother, who is retired, taught the second grade at the Hillside School in Hastings-on-Hudson, N.Y. His father, also retired, taught high school classes to patients at the Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center in New York.
